name: appium-uiautomator2-server
description: A netty server with uiautomator2 handlers
author: https://github.com/appium

scripts.build: ./gradlew clean assembleServerDebug assembleServerDebugAndroidTest && npm run move-apks
scripts.move-apks: rm -rf apks && mkdir -p apks && npm run move-server && npm run move-test
scripts.version: npm run bump-gradle-version && npm run build
scripts.clean-device: adb uninstall io.appium.uiautomator2.server && adb uninstall io.appium.uiautomator2.server.test
